title: Hydragloss Lips
description: A lip treatment that combines deep hydration with a natural tint for plump, juicy, glass-like lips.

title: Powder Brows
description: Soft, makeup-like finish. Long-lasting (1-3 years). Perfect shape, no daily filling. Ideal for all skin types. Smudge-proof & low maintenance. Flawless brows, 24/7.

title: Hairstrokes Brows
description: Natural, hair-like finish. Perfect for sparse or thin brows. Custom shape and definition. Blends seamlessly with real hair. Smudge-proof & long-lasting (12-18 months). Realistic. Refined. Ready every day.

title: Deep Facial Cleaning
description: A purifying reset for your skin, deep facial cleaning removes buildup, unclogs pores, and restores clarity from within.
benefits: Leaves skin fresh, clean, and glowing
Perfect prep for flawless, radiant skin.

title: BB Glow
description: Achieve flawless, radiant skin with Stayve BB Glow, a semi-permanent foundation treatment infused through microneedling for instant and lasting luminosity.
benefits: Evens out skin tone with a natural glow
Reduces redness, pigmentation, and dark spots

title: Korean Skin Booster
description: A luxe fusion of microneedling and Stayve’s premium Korean serums, this treatment delivers deep hydration, brightening, and skin renewal.
benefits: Boosts collagen for firmer, smoother skin
